titleStmt.title: There is newly published, the four following usefull and necessary books. The queens closet opened ... The exact dealer refined ... the third edition, enlarged. ... The young secretary's guide: or, A speedy help to learning. In two parts. ... The strange and prodigious religions, customs, and manners, of sundry nations ... the second edition. All four printed for Henry Rhodes ...

notesStmt.note: Three copies of this item filmed.
Imperfect: copy at E4:2[42b-43b] cropped, with loss of text at verso, top; all copies stained and with print show-through. Reel position E4:2[44a-b] filmed twice to adjust exposure.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
